system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.aa-rulebook.Item.CbH9UMxgrmEr8tFh]{Personal Plasmas Proficiency}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.aa-rulebook.Item.I2ulORBcKU6kkakv]{Advanced Plasmas Proficiency}

Benefits

The character can perform bounceshot, pulseshot, and focusshot attacks at a -3 penalty.

Normal

Characters without this feat take a -6 attack penalty when attempting a bounceshot, pulseshot, or focusshot attack.
system.summary: Reduced bounceshot, pulseshot and focusshot penalty
